                    # é“¾è¡¨

                    é“¾è¡¨æ˜¯ä¸€ç§çº¿æ€§æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œé“¾è¡¨çš„æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå„èŠ‚ç‚¹é€šè¿‡ â€œæŒ‡é’ˆâ€ è¿æ¥ï¼ŒæŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å†…å­˜åœ°å€ï¼Œé€šè¿‡æŒ‡é’ˆå¯ä»¥è®¿é—®ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚åœ¨é“¾è¡¨ä¸­æ’å…¥ä¸åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹éå¸¸æ–¹ä¾¿ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦æ”¹å˜æŒ‡é’ˆçš„æŒ‡å‘å³å¯ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥é“¾è¡¨æ’å…¥ä¸åˆ é™¤å…ƒç´ çš„æ•ˆç‡éå¸¸é«˜ã€‚é“¾è¡¨çš„å…ƒç´ èŠ‚ç‚¹è¢«åˆ†æ•£å­˜å‚¨åœ¨å†…å­˜ç©ºé—´ä¸­ï¼Œå®ƒä»¬çš„å†…å­˜åœ°å€æ— é¡»è¿ç»­ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸ç”¨æ‹…å¿ƒç©ºé—´ç¢ç‰‡çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚

                    é“¾è¡¨çš„ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼š

                    • è®¿é—®æ•ˆç‡ä½ï¼šé“¾è¡¨éœ€è¦ä»å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹å¼€å§‹ï¼Œå‘åéå†ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æ‰¾åˆ°ç›®æ ‡èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚

                    • å ç”¨å†…å­˜å¤§ï¼šé“¾è¡¨é™¤äº†éœ€è¦å­˜å‚¨èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼ï¼Œè¿˜è¦å­˜å‚¨èŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡é’ˆã€‚å¦‚æœèŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°æ®è¶Šå¤šï¼ŒæŒ‡é’ˆçš„å†…å­˜å½±å“å°±è¶Šå°ã€‚

                    TS
                    class LinkedNode<T> {
  val: T
  next: LinkedNode<T> | null
  
  constructor(val: T) {
    this.val = val
    this.next = null
  }
}

class LinkedList<T> {
  head: LinkedNode<T> | null
  size: number
  
  constructor(val?: T) {
    this.head = null
    this.size = 0
    if (val) {
      this.append(val)
    }
  }
  
  /**
   * å‘é“¾è¡¨å°¾éƒ¨æ·»åŠ èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param val - èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   */
  append(val: T) {
    const node = new LinkedNode(val)
    if (!this.head) {
      this.head = node
    }
    else {
      let current = this.head
      while (current.next) {
        current = current.next
      }
      current.next = node
    }
    this.size++
  }
  
  /**
   * æ’å…¥èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   * @param val - èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   */
  insert(index: number, val: T) {
    if (index < 0 || index > this.size) throw new Error("out of range")
    
    const node = new LinkedNode(val)
    if (index === 0) {
      node.next = this.head
      this.head = node
    }
    else {
      let current = this.head
      let prev: LinkedNode<T> | null = null
      for (let i = 0; i < index; i++) {
        prev = current
        current = current!.next
      }
      prev!.next = node
      node.next = current
    }
    this.size++
  }
  
  /**
   * æŸ¥æ‰¾å¯¹åº”ç´¢å¼•çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   */
  find(index: number) {
    if (index < 0 || index > this.size) throw new Error("out of range")
    
    let current = this.head
    for (let i = 0; i < index; i++) {
      current = current!.next
    }
    return current
  }
  
  /**
   * ä¿®æ”¹å¯¹åº”ç´¢å¼•çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   * @param val - èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   */
  update(index: number, val: T) {
    const node = this.find(index)
    node!.val = val
  }
  
  /**
   * ç§»é™¤å¯¹åº”ç´¢å¼•çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   */
  remove(index: number) {
    if (index < 0 || index >= this.size) throw new Error("out of range")
    
    let current = this.head
    let prev: LinkedNode<T> | null = null
    if (index === 0) {
      this.head = current!.next
      current = null
    }
    else {
      for (let i = 0; i < index; i++) {
        prev = current
        current = current!.next
      }
      prev!.next = current!.next
      current = null
    }
    this.size--
  }
  
  /**
   * éå†é“¾è¡¨
   */
  each(callback: (val: T, index: number) => void) {
    let current = this.head
    let index = 0
    callback(current!.val, index++)
    while (current!.next) {
      current = current!.next
      callback(current.val, index++)
    }
  }
}

                    # åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨

                    åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ èŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æŒ‡å‘ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹å’Œä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚

                    TS
                    class LinkedNode<T> {
  val: T
  prev: LinkedNode<T> | null
  next: LinkedNode<T> | null
  
  constructor(val: T) {
    this.val = val
    this.prev = null
    this.next = null
  }
}

class DoubleLinkedList<T> {
  head: LinkedNode<T> | null
  tail: LinkedNode<T> | null
  size: number
  
  constructor(val?: T) {
    this.head = null
    this.tail = null
    this.size = 0
    if (val) {
      this.append(val)
    }
  }
  
  /**
   * å‘é“¾è¡¨å°¾éƒ¨æ·»åŠ èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param val - èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   */
  append(val: T) {
    const node = new LinkedNode(val)
    if (!this.head) {
      this.head = node
      this.tail = node
    }
    else {
      this.tail!.next = node
      node.prev = this.tail
      this.tail = node
    }
    this.size++
  }
  
  /**
   * æ’å…¥èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   * @param val - èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   */
  insert(index: number, val: T) {
    if (index < 0 || index > this.size) throw new Error("out of range")
    
    const node = new LinkedNode(val)
    if (this.size === 0) {
      this.head = node
      this.tail = node
    }
    else {
      if (index === 0) {
        this.head!.prev = node
        node.next = this.head
        this.head = node
      }
      else if (index === this.size) {
        this.tail!.next = node
        node.prev = this.tail
        this.tail = node
      }
      else {
        let current = this.head
        for (let i = 0; i < index; i++) {
          current = current!.next
        }
        node.prev = current!.prev
        node.next = current
        current!.prev!.next = node
        current!.prev = node
      }
    }
    this.size++
  }
  
  /**
   * æŸ¥æ‰¾å¯¹åº”ç´¢å¼•çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   */
  find(index: number) {
    if (index < 0 || index > this.size) throw new Error("out of range")
    
    // ä»å‰å¾€å
    if (this.size / 2 > index) {
      let current = this.head
      for (let i = 0; i < index; i++) {
        current = current!.next
      }
      return current
    }
    // ä»åå¾€å‰
    else {
      let current = this.tail
      for (let i = this.size - 1; i > index; i--) {
        current = current!.prev
      }
      return current
    }
  }
  
  /**
   * ä¿®æ”¹å¯¹åº”ç´¢å¼•çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   * @param val - èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   */
  update(index: number, val: T) {
    const node = this.find(index)
    node!.val = val
  }
  
  /**
   * ç§»é™¤å¯¹åº”ç´¢å¼•çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   */
  remove(index: number) {
    if (index < 0 || index >= this.size) throw new Error("out of range")
    
    let current = this.head
    if (this.size === 1) {
      this.head = null
      this.tail = null
    }
    else {
      if (index === 0) {
        this.head!.next!.prev = null
        this.head = this.head!.next
      }
      else if (index === this.size - 1) {
        current = this.tail
        this.tail!.prev!.next = null
        this.tail = this.tail!.prev
      }
      else {
        for (let i = 0; i < index; i++) {
          current = current!.next
        }
        current!.prev!.next = current!.next
        current!.next!.prev = current!.prev
      }
    }
    this.size--
    return current!.val
  }
  
  /**
   * éå†é“¾è¡¨
   */
  each(callback: (val: T, index: number) => void) {
    let current = this.head
    let index = 0
    callback(current!.val, index++)
    while (current!.next) {
      current = current!.next
      callback(current.val, index++)
    }
  }
}
